products.title: Zumba Indigo Curtain
products.description: The zumba indigo curtain is a stunning contemporary take on 70s style and features a bright burst of floral pattern. This curtain also boasts 100% cotton fabric and a full lining to give more weight and thickness to the curtain. The zumba design is sure to refresh your space with its bloom of blues and greens. Product id: db-cur1200 fabric colour: indigo material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes zumba indigo curtain in blue/green/multicoloured.

products.title: Twirl Indigo Blue Curtain
products.description: The twirl indigo curtain boasts a cheerful 70s inspired design with a bright burst of floral pattern. The design is printed on 100% cotton fabric and is fully lined to give more weight and thickness to the curtain. This colourful curtain is sure to refresh your space with its uplifting mix of blues and greens. products.title: Shoal Indigo Curtain
products.description: Their shoal range is a fishy pattern available in two stunning shades. These bold blue patterned curtains are inspired by shoals of fish and are the perfect choice to create an aquatic feel in any room in your home. products.title: Azurite Chenille Indigo Blue Curtain
products.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This bold dark blue curtain fuses a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary blue tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. These rich navy curtains will look beautiful with dark wooden tones and will create a striking look when paired with rich jewel colours. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk.

products.title: Alpaca Indigo Blue Curtain
products.description: Set to make a statement the alpaca indigo blue curtain will be sure to add character to your space with hand sketched alpaca's inspired by native american's they are geared up with feather head dressings and funky printed saddles how cute. The deep blue backdrop is striking and on trend. So where will you put this fun packed curtain? At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service team.
